title: Echoes in the Glass
goal: Introduce Lyra and connect her to Kaelen's discovery.
stakes_shift: The threat expands from a local event to a scholarly crisis.

bridge.to_next: Lyra and Kaelen's paths converge at the border town.

sections.title: The Scholar's Lament
sections.intent: Show Lyra's expertise and her frustration with the academy.

scenes.summary: Lyra identifies a shift in the constellations that the High Council ignores.
scenes.outcome: Lyra decides to investigate the starfall independently.

scenes.summary: Lyra steals a resonance-tuning fork from the academy vaults.
scenes.outcome: Lyra is now a thief in the eyes of the law.

scenes.summary: Kaelen arrives at the market, trying to hide the glowing shard beneath his cloak.
scenes.outcome: Kaelen's presence attracts unwanted attention from bounty hunters.

scenes.summary: Lyra's tuning fork reacts violently to Kaelen's proximity.
scenes.outcome: Lyra tracks the source of the resonance to Kaelen.

sections.title: Unlikely Alliance
sections.intent: Establish the dynamic between Kaelen and Lyra.

scenes.summary: Bounty hunters corner Kaelen; Lyra uses a flash-powder distraction to help him.
In a hidden cellar, Lyra examines the shard and realizes it’s a 'Star-Heart'.
scenes.outcome: The true nature of the object is revealed; it's a seed of a dying world.

scenes.summary: They agree to travel to the Great Observatory to find a way to neutralize the shard.
